data.event: The town has a mention in the great survey of 1086 known as the Domesday Book.

event.title: were held on the 25th of April

data.event: By this time Holt had a well-established market and two annual fairs which were held on the 25th of April and the 25th of November.
Over the years Holt grew as a local place of trade and commerce.
The weekly market which has taken place since before the 1080s was stopped in 1960s.
